DataElement.preferredName: Person Breast Intervention or Procedure Disease Disorder or Finding Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response for questions addressing activities that produce an effect, or intended to alter the course of breast disease that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects related to neoplasms and non-neoplastic disorders including observations, test results, history and other concepts relevant to the characterization of pathologic conditions, as outlined in the study protocol to allow a person to participate in the clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Breast Intervention or Procedure Disease, Disorder or Finding Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest._An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects._A condition that is relevant to human neoplasms and non-neoplastic disorders.  This includes observations, test results, history and other concepts relevant to the characterization of human pathologic conditions._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Property.preferredName: Breast Intervention or Procedure Disease, Disorder or Finding Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.:An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.:A condition that is relevant to human neoplasms and non-neoplastic disorders.  This includes observations, test results, history and other concepts relevant to the characterization of human pathologic conditions.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.

An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

A condition that is relevant to human neoplasms and non-neoplastic disorders.  This includes observations, test results, history and other concepts relevant to the characterization of human pathologic conditions.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 7/12/16 tt/dl, released approved content.  1/25/16 tt, curated for E4112.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the decision been made as
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the decision been made as to whether the patient will proceed to wide local excision or mastectomy, or has patient been diagnosed with invasive disease?
